abstract: Readers, and a "rat," weigh in on an M.T.A. experiment to make garbage receptacles disappear.
snippet: Readers, and a "rat," weigh in on an M.T.A. experiment to make garbage receptacles disappear.
lead_paragraph: In Tuesday's New York Times, Michael M. Grynbaum explored the rationale behind a counterintuitive plan by New York City Transit to remove trash bins from some subway stations as a way to discourage passengers from disposing of trash in the system.

headline.main: Your Views on Trash-Can-Less Subways: Lame, Laudable, Other
